text: Alla fawatah fittaandu kondu hattanaani,woodanii ndu kondu faggii, fawiima e dow mayru kondu faggitii,Joomi amen woto nanngir min ko min njjiti ko wollo ko min ngoopi ko,woto A faw e amen tampere hono no ndoondirnaɗa ɓeen adiiɓe amen,Joomi amen woto faw min komin kattanaani,yaafa amin cuura bakkatuuJi amen nJurmaɗa min ko Aan woni keeda amin wollu min e dow yimɓe heefereeɓe ɓe
